writeAttribute

public static void writeAttribute(Writer out,
                                  String name,
                                  Object value,
                                  boolean escape)
                           throws IOException
Writers attribute of form ' ATTR_NAME="value"'. If value is null, writes nothing. If escape is set to true HTML escaping takes place on the value (<, >, ", & get replaced with the entities).

Throws:
IOException

writeScriptString

public static void writeScriptString(Writer out,
                                     String value,
                                     boolean escapeEntities)
                              throws IOException
Writes given String properly formatted for javascript in single quotes.

Parameters:
escapeEntities - set it to true if you want to escape XML entities like &amp;, <lt; etc.
Throws:
IOException
See Also:
writeEscapedScriptString(java.io.Writer, java.lang.String, boolean)

writeScriptString_rt

                                        String value,
                                        String expression)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        AraneaJspException
Writes script string or expression evaluating to a string.

Parameters:
out -
value - string value
expression - expression
Throws:
AraneaJspException - if both value and expression are specified
IOException

                         throws IOException
Writes out escaped string. null values are omitted.

Throws:

writeEscapedScriptString

public static void writeEscapedScriptString(Writer out,
                                            String value,
                                            boolean escapeEntities)
                                     throws IOException
Writes out escaped script string (can be used also in attributes). null values are omitted.

Parameters:
escapeEntities - - when this is true, standard XML entities are used to escape greater-than, less-than, ampersand and double-quotes. Otherwise, these symbols are left as they are. Set this attribute to true, if you write javascript inside an attribute, and set it to false if you write javascript inside a <script> tag.
Throws:
IOException

public static void writeEventAttributes(Writer out,
                                        UiEvent event)
                                 throws IOException
Throws:
IOException

                                           String value)
                                    throws IOException
Writes out hidden html input element with give name and value.

Throws:
IOException

parseMultiValuedAttribute

public static List parseMultiValuedAttribute(String attribute)
Parses multi-valued attribute, where attributes are separated by commas. Empty attribute values are allowed, they are specified by including whitespace between commas: "first, ,third".

Returns:
List<String> containing attribute values.

                                         String key)
                                  throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Read attribute value from request scope and ensure that it is defined.

Throws:
AraneaJspException - if key is not present in given PageContext
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

getPageContext

public static javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext getPageContext(javax.servlet.jsp.JspContext jspContext)
Retrieves PageContext from a JSP context. This mean basically casting, but sometimes is simpler.

Parameters:
jspContext - A regular JSP context.
Returns:
A PageContext.
